attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to put the hammer and sickle on the democratic scales of justice. To bring peace with those countries of a democracy, and those of a communistically government, and also to have a hammer and sickle somewhere on the flag. You have got to admit that communism has a cool logo!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
